nodes.text: A Klatooinian served as the captain of a group of raiders. The Klatooinian led a number of attacks on a farming village on the planet Sorgan. When the villagers requested assistance in dealing with the attacks, the bounty hunter known as the Mandalorian and the ex-shock trooper Carasynthia Dune provoked the Klatooinians, leading to a skirmish in which their AT-ST was destroyed and the leader was killed by the farmers Caben and Stoke. Having been defeated, the remaining Klatooinians fled, ceasing their attacks on the village.

The Klatooinian raider appeared in "Chapter 4: Sanctuary," the fourth episode of Jon Favreau's Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, which aired on November 29, 2019. The character was portrayed by Sala Baker. Despite the raider's apparent death in the episode, the actor claimed the character would return in the show's second season prior to its release. However, the character did not make an appearance in the season after it aired.
